fake2db.description: Fake2db is a fake database generator for testing purposes.

harlequin.description: The SQL IDE for your terminal. A TUI for DuckDB, SQLite, Postgres, and more

iredis.description: Iredis is a Redis terminal client with auto-completion and syntax highlighting.

litecli.description: Litecli is a command line interface for SQLite with auto-completion and syntax highlighting.

mycli.description: Mycli is a command line interface for MySQL with auto-completion and syntax highlighting.

peewee.description: Peewee is a small, expressive ORM for Python.

pgcli.description: Pgcli is a command line interface for PostgreSQL with auto-completion and syntax highlighting.

sqlparse.description: Sqlparse is a non-validating SQL parser for Python.

sqlite-utils.description: Python CLI utility and library for manipulating SQLite databases
